auras.name: Vorpal lance
auras.desc: Launches a piercing lance that deals considerable damage

auras.name: Laser Storm
auras.desc: Releases Laser Moons for a short time that deal great damage

ult.name: Laser Moon Mk.II
ult.desc: Laser moons shoot two lasers,dealing extra damage

auras.name: Missile swarm
auras.desc: releases a volley of high-burst damage missiles

ult.name: Advanced targeting
ult.desc: Missiles will change targets if their current one is destroyed, only applies to targets that were inside the aura upon activation.

auras.name: Ion cannon
auras.desc: launches a projectile that will stun whatever it hits

ult.name: EMP bomb
ult.desc: Deals moderate damage in a moderate radius

auras.name: Bullet EMP
auras.desc: destroys all bullets in it's radius

ult.name: Reset Stun
ult.desc: stuns enemies for a short time to reset their turrets,useful against spinners

auras.name: Phalanx
auras.desc: created a temporary shield in front of your ship

ult.name: Wide Phalanx
ult.desc: Makes the Phalanx wider and increases it's durability

auras.name: Stun EMP
auras.desc: stuns all enemies in the radius

ult.name: Stun bomb
ult.desc: deals moderate damage to invaders in the radius.

auras.name: Chrono Field
auras.desc: phases your ship out for a limited time in a small radius

ult.name: Phase out
ult.desc: Phases the ship out for half a second when they exit the field

auras.name: Point Defense
auras.desc: destroys a small amount of bullets around the ship

ult.name: MIRV defense
ult.desc: MIRVs are easier to get rid of

auras.name: Blade storm
auras.desc: Variant of Missile Swarm. deals less damage but requires much less energy to use

ult.name: Omnislash
ult.desc: Small buff to stats. Any special effect has yet to be determined.

auras.name: Barrier
auras.desc: Erects a circular barrier that absorbs enemy fire

ult.name: Inner lining
ult.desc: Created a secondary barrier inside the primary one to absorb enemy fire inside the barrier
